Use this function to create a
instance to correspond with a specified white point and a transfer function. The

instance defines a monochrome color space. (A Yâ€™CbCr color space is an RGB color space and a conversion matrix from RGB to Yâ€™CbCr.) The white point provides the extent of a color space in XYZ space, and the transfer function provides the transformation from linear color to nonlinear color that the pixels reside in.
